Name: ConanExiles
Overview: This Docker will download and install SteamCMD. It will also install Conan Exiles and run it.

TCP1 - Game Port.Name: TCP1 - Game Port
TCP1 - Game Port.Description: TCP Game Port (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new TCP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to change your server settings)

UDP1 - Game Port.Name: UDP1 - Game Port
UDP1 - Game Port.Description: UDP Game Port (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new UDP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to change your server settings)

UDP2 - Game Port +1.Name: UDP2 - Game Port +1
UDP2 - Game Port +1.Description: UDP Game Port +1 (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new UDP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to change your server settings)

UDP3 - Steam Port.Name: UDP3 - Steam Port
UDP3 - Steam Port.Description: UDP Steam Port (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new UDP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to change your server settings)

GAME_ID.Name: GAME_ID
GAME_ID.Description:
The GAME_ID that the container download at startup.
(https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Dedicated_Servers_List)

GAME_PARAMS.Name: GAME_PARAMS
GAME_PARAMS.Description: Enter your start up commands for the server.

Steam-Username.Name: Steam-Username
Steam-Username.Description: Your Steam username goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

Validate Installation.Name: Validate Installation
Validate Installation.Description: Set the Variable to 'true' if you want to validate the installation otherwise leave it blank.

Steam-Password.Name: Steam-Password
Steam-Password.Description: Your Steam password goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

Workshop Content.Name: Workshop Content
Workshop Content.Description: Enter you Workshopcontent here, you can also enter multiple WS Content ID's sperated by SPACE
